event: The mouse pointer is clicking on the empty desktop area.
description: The user right-clicked on an empty area of the desktop, which opened a context menu with options such as "Arrange Icons By," "Refresh," "Paste," and "Properties."
outcome: A context menu with options for "Arrange Icons By", "Refresh", "Paste", "Paste Shortcut", "New", and "Properties" replaced the cursor in the top left corner of the screen.

event: The mouse is clicking on the "Properties" item in the right-click context menu.
description: The user clicks on the "Properties" item in the right-click context menu. As a result, the "Display Properties" window opens.
outcome: The "Display Properties" window opened, with the "Themes" tab selected by default. The right-click context menu closed.

event: The mouse is clicking the "Screen Saver" tab in the "Display Properties" window.
description: The user clicked the "Screen Saver" tab in the "Display Properties" window.
outcome: The "Display Properties" window shifted focus from the "Themes" tab to the "Screen Saver" tab.

event: The mouse is clicking on the dropdown button of the "Screen saver" list box in the "Display Properties" window.
description: The user clicked the dropdown button of the "Screen saver" list box.
outcome: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu within the "Display Properties" window opened, displaying "Windows XP" as the currently selected value.

event: The mouse is clicking on the "Power..." button in the "Display Properties" window.
description: The user clicked the "Power..." button within the "Display Properties" window's "Screen Saver" tab.  As a result, the "Power Options Properties" window opened.
outcome: A new window, "Power Options Properties," appeared in front of the "Display Properties" window.

event: The mouse is clicking on the "Power..." button in the "Display Properties" window.
description: The user clicks the "Power..." button within the "Screen Saver" tab of the "Display Properties" window. This action opens the "Power Options Properties" window.
outcome: The "Power Options Properties" window appeared, overlaying the "Display Properties" window. The cursor, previously hovering over the "Power..." button in the background window, changed to a white arrow. The new window shows the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme selected, with the monitor set to turn off after 20 minutes.

event: The mouse is clicking on the dropdown button to the right of the "Turn off monitor" setting.
description: The user clicks the dropdown button next to the "Turn off monitor" setting.
outcome: The "Power Options Properties" window shows the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu open. The currently selected value is "After 20 mins".

event: The mouse is clicking on the "Never" option in the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu.
description: The user clicked "Never" in the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu to set the monitor to never turn off automatically.
outcome: The "Turn off monitor" option within the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme was set to "Never" from a closed dropdown menu.

event: The mouse is clicking on the OK button of the Display Properties window.
description: The user clicks the "OK" button at the bottom of the "Power Options Properties" window.
outcome: The "Power Options Properties" window closed, and the "Display Properties" window remained open.

event: The mouse pointer is over the OK button of the Display Properties window and the user is clicking the button.
description: The user clicked the "OK" button in the Display Properties window. As a result, the Display Properties window closed.
outcome: The Windows XP desktop is visible. The "Display Properties" window is not present.
